description:
Douki-chan tries to take advantage of the mix-up on a business trip to seduce a coworker she likes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Due to a Mix-up at the Hotel, Two Coworkers End Up Sharing a Room on a Business Trip
Shucchou Saki no Hotel no Techigai de, Aibeya ni Natte Shimatta Kaisha no Douki
出張先のホテルの手違いで, 相部屋になってしまった会社の同期
